item.description:
Admission is FREE! on Saturday mornings from :10 -12:00.

TIME: 10am
(meetup at the front entrance next to the gift shop)
COST: FREE!
www.worcesterart.org

Worcester Art Museum is world renowned. WAM features a 35,000 piece collection featurung must-see masterpieces spanning the globe! From Ancient mosaics to Contemporary art, special exhibits showcase master works & seldom seen gems, also important works on loan. Experience magnificant artwork from 5 millenia world cultures. View paintings by Cassat, Gaugin, Goya, Monet, Sargent and Whistler. Admire floor mosaics from the Ancient city of Antioch. See cutting-edge Contemporary Art and discover the museum's other features.
There are several exhibits on view in addition
to their collection:
*The Wall- Alexander Ross
* Textile Heirlooms from the Indus Valley
*Printmaking and stencil methods
*Treasures from Winterthur Museum (in Delaware)
*Bringing the War Home

I was a member of WAM for many years and took classes there. WAM is a real jewel of a museum.

NOTE:* The Merrimack Connection Meetup Grp will also be attending.
Later,we could all head out for lunch at a nearby restaurant.
item.name: Saturday am @ The WAM
